ValidationRule.description: Sales/CSMs can't create Customer accounts directly. Customer accounts must have closed won opportunities.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: ISNEW() && OR(RecordType.Name = "Customer", RecordType.Name = "Webdam") && OR(CONTAINS($Profile.Name,"Customer Success"), CONTAINS($Profile.Name,"Sales"))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You can't create a new customer account directly. Please contact Salesforce Admins if needed.
